pages.text: $(li)The Knockback enchantment can be applied in any kind of Item.$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the knockback strenght of the hits made with the enchanted item with this enchantment, pushing them further.
pages.title: Knockback

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level II.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level III of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Knockback).
